documentation.text: @dev returns the decimal places of a token

@dev transfers the `amount` of tokens from caller's account
 to the `recipient` account.
 returns boolean value indicating the operation status.
 Emits a {Transfer} event

decimals().details: returns the decimal places of a token

transfer(address,uint256).details: transfers the `amount` of tokens from caller's account to the `recipient` account. returns boolean value indicating the operation status. Emits a {Transfer} event
